Package ohos.agp.components.element

Interface Element.OnLayoutDirectionChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageAnimationElement
    Enclosing class:
    Element

    public static interface Element.OnLayoutDirectionChangeListener
    Provides a callback to listen for element layout direction changes.

    This class receives a notification when the Element layout direction changes.

    Since:
    6

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean onLayoutDirectionChanged​(Element element, Component.LayoutDirection direction)
      Called when the layout direction of an Element changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onLayoutDirectionChanged

        boolean onLayoutDirectionChanged​(Element element,
                                 Component.LayoutDirection direction)
        Called when the layout direction of an Element changes.
        Parameters:
        element - Indicates the Element whose layout direction is changed.
        direction - Indicates the updated layout direction.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Element needs invalidation (re-drawing); returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        7
